controllers

Class AlbumController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.AlbumController

  • public class AlbumController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class responsible for handling all user interactions while the album view is active.
    Author:
    Evan Loriot, Joseph Klaszky

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage mainStage)
        Called when the user enters the album view. Handles all user interactions when adding items to/editing items in an album.
        Parameters:
        mainStage - current application stage

      • addPhoto

        public void addPhoto(java.lang.String location)
        Adds a photo to the album that the user is currently in.
        Parameters:
        location - Location of the photo that is being added.

      • deletePhoto

        public void deletePhoto(java.lang.String location)
        Deletes a photo from the album the user is currently in.
        Parameters:
        location - Location of the photo that is being deleted.

      • getPhotos

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Photo>> getPhotos()
        Gets a list all of the photos in the current album.
        Returns:
        A list of all of the photo objects contained in this album.

      • resizePhotos

        public void resizePhotos()
        Resizes a list of photo objects to be displayed
